text: Morzaria-Luna H (2023). pssalmonsurvival: Sensitivity analysis salmon survival Puget Sound. R package version 0.0.0.9001.

what: Package for the analysis of cumulative impacts on salmon survival in Puget Sound. Simulated using an Atlantis Ecosystem model

text: Hem Nalini Morzaria-Luna1, Isaac C. Kaplan2, Chris J. Harvey2, Michael Schmidt1, Elizabeth . Fulton4, Raphael Girardin3, Parker MacCready5 Long Live Kings. 1326 5th Ave #450, Seattle, WA 98101.
